SEARCH
Package org.infinispan.persistence.internal

Class PersistenceUtil

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.persistence.internal.PersistenceUtil
public class PersistenceUtil extends Object
Persistence Utility that is useful for internal classes. Normally methods that require non public classes, such as PersistenceManager, should go in here.
Since:
9.4
Author:
William Burns
